snippet.title: Anchor : The Last Hope of the Brilliant Ocean v3.01 (Windows game 2002)
snippet.description:
Anchor is a simple side-scroller game whose background is an ocean (sea).
It's made with Click & Create of Europress Software (Clickteam).
The main character submarine catch fish using a harpoon (gig) and put them into the cage.
Then you have to throw fish at the yacht afloat to get some scores.

The submarine can use a torpedo to destroy underwater mines and white-anchor's minions.
